Description:
Blank Canvas In Potters Northside
The popular Potters North Estate is now sold out and this is your exclusive chance to acquire a prized block in the Estate if you have missed out on buying earlier. (Lot 121) 2 Jomon Way is conveniently located on the north side of Princes Highway. The flat corner block offers a 474m2 blank canvas to build your own dream home amongst properties that are nearly completed and where you can get a feel for the neighbourhood. Dont miss out on this exclusive opportunity to buy this block of land near all the Officer commodities, with the best primary and secondary schools in the region nearby and with easy access to/from the freeway. The vendors said SELL, so call us now to discuss.

Titled land in Officer at an affordable price
This beautiful community has something for everyone, a healthier lifestyle and brighter tomorrow at an affordable price.
All located within the development and just a few short minutes to:
- The future Officer town centre
- Officer and Cardinia Rd train stations
- Officer Secondary College, Officer Specialist School and other future primary schools

Description:
Perfect investment opportunity
Discover an inviting low maintenance townhouse offering a modern, spacious floor plan. Located moments from walking paths, shopping facilities, the Monash Freeway and public transport, you simply won't find a more convenient location to call home. Upstairs there are three large robed bedrooms, the master with a full ensuite. A huge well-appointed and stylish kitchen and an open plan living and dining area combine with a second private sitting room that takes in views of the parkland reserve to the front of the home. Neutral tones feature throughout, ducted heating and rear access from the double lock up garage, making this a comfortable and easy-care home. A private courtyard adds to the appeal. Currently leased until 21/08/2017 at $345 per week or $1495.00 per calendar month. This is a must see for those seeking a low maintenance and affordable home to occupy or rent out. Call now to secure your inspection.
Insights: 12 Peppermint Row, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Sky’s the limit on Skyline Drive!
Situated in arguably Officers best Estate – Grandvue Estate and surrounded by exquisite homes and parklands, this makes for a very easy decision! Buy the land and start building your dream home in this premium estate of Officer. Enjoying an elevated position allowing views to Western Port Bay, this is certainly one of the best allotments on which to build your stunning residence.
Boasting a sizable frontage, this 1043m2 block will allow you enough room to build your dream home. With majority of the leg work already done for you, such as soil test and engineering reports as well as approved plans which is all titled and ready to be settled as soon as you need it!
Everything is here from charming cafes and some of Australia's most elite education facilities, such as St Francis Xavier College , right at your door. Please contact today for further information as this opportunity will not last long.

Description:
27 sq Family Home in Arcadia Estate, Officer
Built in 2015 on 508m2 of land and available for a short settlement, this home has all a family could want!
Less than a 5 minute drive to the new Officer Secondary College, Officer and Cardinia Train Stations, Club Officer, Arena SC, Lakeside Square and all the amenities that Pakenham offers.
The Master Bedroom is 4.96m x 3.79m plus over 4m of WIR and an Ensuite with double vanity, 1000 x 1800mm shower and a separate toilet.
Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 have built in robes and are serviced by a Family Bathroom, separate toilet and a double Linen Cupboard.
The Kitchen has extensive Stone benchtops, a 900mm SS upright oven and SS Dishwasher and a large Walk In Pantry.
The spacious Laundry has a built in Linen/ Broom cupboard.
Living space comprises of an L-shaped Meals/ Family PLUS a separate Theatre/ Rumpus Room of 4.9m x 4.3m, and an Alfresco under the roof line.
The home has ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling.
Please see open for inspection times.
Further investment information:
Are you interested in buying an investment property, interested in significant potential tax savings or would like review the different options of wealth creation through property?
Contact us for a free, no obligation personalised property investment analysis.

Family Home in Highly Desirable Location
This spacious four bedroom home ticks all the boxes for the home owner or astute investor. In the sought-after Arcadia Estate, the property is close to all amenities such as schools, shops, medical facilities, Club Officer and it is within walking distance to Cardinia Road Train Station. Upon entering the home, you are welcomed with a spacious master bedroom complimented by ensuite and walk in robe. Three further generous bedrooms' feature built-in-robes and are serviced by a stylish family bathroom and separate toilet. The home offers a family friendly tiled kitchen and meals area alongside the large family living space which opens via sliding doors onto a grassed rear garden. The modern kitchen features stainless steel appliances including 900mm oven and dishwasher. An additional separate living area at the front of the home provides plenty of space - so that the whole family can spread out, relax and enjoy. The home provides all the creature comforts such as ducted heating, split system air-conditioner, good sized double garage, quality roller blinds throughout and low maintenance gardens with no work to be done. Property tenanted until 22/10/2017. Rental return $385.00 per week. This home has it all and won't last long, contact Michelle Hansford today!

Description:
49sq of Architecturally Designed Living With Side Access
If you are looking for the most exclusive address in Officer then look no further.
Proudly presented for sale is 49 Skyline Drive Officer. Located in Grandvue estate, this street is arguably the most sought after address in Officer.
Architecturally designed with a perfect floor plan for families, this home boasts stunning views with side access for your caravan or boat.
From the very moment you walk through the front door you will feel at home. With a ground level boasting two large living areas, a study plus your very own theatre room, there are plenty of options for the family.
Overlooking the dining and family areas the kitchen will impress any chef of the family. It is the definition of modern, with stone benches, breakfast bar, butler’s pantry and 900mm stainless steel SMEG appliances. The kitchen is finished off with high quality cabinets, overhead cupboards and pot drawers, all equipped with soft close.
The LED downlights fitted throughout the home bring this large area to light. Sitting down to any meal you get a view of the undercover entertaining area and established garden.
The backyard completes the family living, offering a stunning undercover entertaining area which runs the length of the house, making it perfect to store that ultimate “toy”. Entertain guests while watching the children play in the back yard.
Upstairs, you will find the king sized master bedroom. Boasting a spectacular view of the surrounding countryside, it incorporates a huge walk-in-robe and a private ensuite with double vanity and stone benches.
The three queen sized bedrooms with built in robes complement another large living area with a second built in study desk making this area perfect for the children.
The large walk in linen closet and games cupboard on the upper floor added to the under stair storage and the shelving in the laundry will ensure there is a place for everything.
Do not miss the opportunity to come and view this ultimate family home. With approximately 49sq under roof line and high end finishes throughout, it will be sure to complete your house hunting experience.
The location will be the envy of all, not just for the views but the location to parks, schools, shops, public transport, freeways and more. Contact Nicola today to organise a private inspection

Description:
Arena At Officer
Situated in one of the most sought after estates in Officer, Arena, sits this immaculately presented townhouse.
Whether you are looking to move into or invest, this property ticks all the boxes for both location and inclusions.
The home is situated within a short walk to Arena Shopping Centre which features Woolworths, McDonalds, Petrol station as well as many speciality stores.
The convenience of being central to Officer is that it is only a short drive or walk to the Officer Train Station, easy access to the Monash Freeway and also the Princess Highway making your life as easy as possible with everything so close by.
This well set out townhouse offers open plan living down stairs with lounge area overlooking courtyard, tiled meals area and access to kitchen with stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space.
Separate powder room and laundry.
Upstairs comprises a further lounge/retreat with master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe and the two additional bedrooms both with build in robes and main bathroom and seperate toilet.
Other great inclusions of this home are double lock up garage, modern fixtures and fittings, NBN ready, split system heating & cooling down stairs and upstairs features wall panel heaters in each room.
The home sits on approx. 174sq metres of land and has no body corporate.
With the property being only 4 years young there is still plenty of depreciation value left if investing, and in great condition for you to make your own home.
The home is currently tenanted, not on a fixed tenancy, but you couldnt ask for a better tenant.
Currently achieving $340.00 per week in rent.

Description:
NEST OR INVEST IN THIS BRAND-NEW HOME!
Check out this brand-new home perfectly situated in the highly sought after Officer precinct, you will love to be the first to live in this home being fully equipped with all you could ask for.
This home features 4 generous sized bedrooms with the master bedroom including a walk-in robe and ensuite fitted with Caesar stone bench tops and wide set mirror. All the remaining bedrooms offer built in robes.
This home offers an ample amount of living space with 3 separate living areas. You are welcomed with a formal lounge area near upon entry which seamlessly flows into the grand open plan kitchen, meals and dining zone. You also have the option of a study or kids retreat area at the entry of the quiet hallway zone.
The modern kitchen is fully equipped with Caesar stone benchtops, stainless steel 900m Westinghouse gas cooktops, oven and range hood with also plenty of cupboard space. The kitchen overlooks the large open meals area which is perfect for entertaining with friends and family.
Easy low maintenance yard with the block to feature landscaped gardens and an Alfresco for summer entertaining.
This brand-new Orbit home, with landscaping to be completed, is set in a quiet location, close to schools, shops, public transport and M1 access.
Don’t miss out on this one, Call today!

Description:
BRILLIANT DESIGN & PRIME OFFICER LOCATION!
Nest or invest but be quick...
Nestled between both Cardinia and Officer train stations and with easy freeway access, this 2015 completed Metricon sits on a
421sqm approx block and will suit investors wanting the benefits of buying a near new property, first home buyers needing a start
in the market or a downsizer looking for simplicity.
The centre piece of this home is the open plan kitchen that boasts Caesar stone benches, 90cm cooker, 90cm canopy, dishwasher
and an extra-large walk in pantry. The master bedroom is conveniently located at the rear of the home and as such offers a
peaceful haven, complete with ensuite and double BIR's. The 2 remaining bedrooms also have BIR's and share the main bathroom
with shower, bath and a separate toilet.
The extensive inclusions list features GDH, A/C split system cooling, alarm system, security camera system, 3kW solar power
system, NBN (Broadband) ready and double remote garage with internal access.
This fully fenced property has real street appeal and just needs your finishing touches with the rear landscaping not completed.
Call to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
Join the Arena lifestyle
Located in the Arena Estate, this beautiful double storey home is ideal for a family or investor. The open plan lounge and dining area takes you effortlessly out to the covered alfresco area for relaxing and entertaining, also featuring;
- 4 great size bedrooms
- Master with full ensuite and balcony
- 3 generous living areas
- Double remote lockup garage
This home also includes ducted heating and evaporative cooling, located within a short distance to schools, shops, transport and offers easy freeway access - don't miss another fantastic opportunity.

Description:
Instantly Inviting, Perfectly Presented, Marvellous Moorcroft Officer
Located in one of Officers most desired estates Potters Grove, in close proximity to Beaconsfield and Officer town centres, St Francis Xavier College, Arena Shopping Plaza, Cardinia train station and M1 access!
This 2 years young home situated in a friendly quiet street opposite to parkland, this modern home has plenty of street appeal.
Comprising three generous sized bedrooms including master with ensuite and walk in robe and two remaining bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
The modern kitchen exudes quality with stone bench tops, walk in pantry, stainless steel oven and dishwasher!
The open plan living makes entertaining a breeze and leads out to your very own alfresco and backyard complete with turf and low maintenance gardens.
Other features of the home are as follows, ducted heating and split system air-conditioned cooling, double garage, 5KW solar power system, security alarms,CCTV camera, quality blinds and carpets. Plenty to offer for the first home buyer, downsizer, retiree or investor.
Make a time to inspect today!
Insights: 16 Moorcroft Terrace, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.
